name: Mimos
long_description:
Mimos helps regulated companies rank in AI search.

Compliance is the biggest blocker to marketing in regulated industries. Every claim needs to be substantiated, every disclosure included, and mistakes can lead to audits and fines. That’s why campaigns sit in compliance queues for weeks.

Mimos automates this entire loop:
 • Drafts are generated from your policies, past redlines, and the latest regulations
 • Evidence packets and disclaimers are auto-inserted for compliance review
 • Customers click to publish and start seeing new leads within days

Learn more at trymimos.com

===

Rohit & Michael have been working together on various technical project since middle school (13 years!) - and Mimos came about as one of those projects.

Prior to Mimos, Rohit built infrastructure for OpenAI at Microsoft Azure, and Michael shipped AI to 1B+ Alexa devices at Amazon.
one_liner: Helping regulated companies rank in AI search
